SEO.PageTitle: Caviar (CAV) - Live streaming prices and market cap
SEO.PageDescription: Live Caviar prices from all markets and CAV coin market Capitalization. Stay up to date with the latest Caviar price movements and forum discussion. Check out our snapshot charts and see when there is an opportunity to buy or sell.

General.Name: Caviar
General.Description: Caviar is a dual-purpose invesment fund created for crypto and real-estate, allowing token holders to ejoy a diversified, risk adjusted, data-driven portfolio with exposure to both stable real estate and select cryptocurrencies and crypto assets, maximizing return on investment while still hedging against market downturns. CAV is an Ethereum-based ERC20 token that allows real estate developers to raise money for projects through https://news.caviar.io/?gi=bdfb8b740d7a crowdfunding mechanism, while providing Caviar token holders and the underlying fund with an opportunity to participate in projects and earn a profit.

ICO.Description:
Caviar is a dual-purpose invesment fund created for crypto and real-estate, allowing token holders to ejoy a diversified, risk adjusted, data-driven portfolio with exposure to both stable real estate and select cryptocurrencies and crypto assets, maximizing return on investment while still hedging against market downturns. CAV is an Ethereum-based ERC20 token that allows real estate developers to raise money for projects through a crowdfunding mechanism, while providing Caviar token holders and the underlying fund with an opportunity to participate in projects and earn a profit.

Team:

  • Kirill Bensonoff: Partner  
  • Guy Neumann: Partner 
  • Alex Shvayetsky: Partner 

The Caviar pre-sale will start on the 28th of November. The ICO dates are yet to be announced. During the ICO, 85% of the total CAV supply will be sold to participants for a $0.10 starting price. The ICO funding target/cap is $25M.

Token Reserve Split (15%):

  • 3% Bounties
  • 12% Partners and Advisors

The Caviar ICO features a bonus campaign.

Bonus Structure:

  • Days 1 to 3 – 15%
  • Days 4 to 6 – 12.5%
  • Days 7 to 9 – 10%
  • Days 10 to 12 – 7.5%
